= Introduction =
The core development of the IPT is directed by GBIF, but the coding is a community effort and everyone is welcome to join. 

== Source Code ==
Java or html/jquery developers are very welcome to contribute code patches. For your reference, the core frameworks used by the IPT are listed below:

 * [http://struts.apache.org/2.x/index.html Struts2]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/google-guice/ Google Guice]
 * [http://freemarker.sourceforge.net/docs/ Freemarker] templating
 * [http://jquery.com/ JQuery] for javascript and ajax
